name: Signature Series Double Dog Bowl Feeder - Black/Stainless Steel

reviews.name: Just the Right Height Feeder, Signature Series 4" Black/Stainless Dog Feeder
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for our Shihtzu. Good quality and very reasonably priced compared to other food/ water dish holders I looked at.
reviews.title: 27 April 2012

reviews.name: Just the Right Height Feeder, Signature Series 4" Black/Stainless Dog Feeder
reviews.reviewText: My chihuahua loves this feeder. The old one was close to the ground. This one is a few inches off the ground, but not too high. Its stable on the ground and the bowls do not move.
reviews.title: Needed for 6 year old dog

reviews.name: Just the Right Height Feeder, Signature Series 4" Black/Stainless Dog Feeder
reviews.reviewText: My old fat cat seems to like it. She doesn't have to get up to walk around to get the circulation going again in her legs while eating.
reviews.title: 27 December 2011

reviews.name: Just the Right Height Feeder, Signature Series 4" Black/Stainless Dog Feeder
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my Maltese. It's a great height and it looks great in the house.
reviews.title: love it

reviews.name: Just the Right Height Feeder, Signature Series 4" Black/Stainless Dog Feeder
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this product. Only complaint was the exchangeable sides kept falling down. Easy fix, glue your choice of color in place. Very attractive and functional.
reviews.title: 03 August 2012
